overview:
Ransom Parker has worked with a number of portfolio companies including Sandburst (acquired by Broadcom), Cronos Integrated Microsystems (acquired by JDS Uniphase), MSI Software (acquired by AtStaff) and V3 Systems (acquired by Click Commerce). Ransom has been a Managing Director with SpaceVest and prior to that, was President, Chief Operating officer and a director on the board of the AFFINITY Systems Division of The Compucare Company (acquired by Quadramed), a healthcare information systems software developer. Mr. Parker spearheaded AFFINITY’s successful transition from an outsourcing and services business model to an enterprise class software product delivery and support model. He also worked to secure a $32 million private equity placement and two business acquisitions. Prior to The Compucare Company, Mr. Parker was the Mid-Atlantic regional operations manager for Shared Medical Systems Corporation (acquired by Siemens AG) and he held progressively more responsible executive management positions with Technicon Data Systems (acquired by Eclipsys).

Ransom received a B.S. in biological sciences from Fairleigh Dickinson University and a M.H.A. in healthcare administration from The George Washington University.
